descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains information related to Retail/E-commerce sales and the type of rewards that is achieved by the customers. The dataset consist of only 150 records.

The dataset contains the following columns:
Gender, Age, Membership, Loyalty Points, Discount, Gift, Earlybird, Reward

Gender- Categorical variable. It denotes the customer's gender.
Age - Numerical variable. It denotes the age of the customer.
Membership - Categorical variable. It denotes type of membership selected by the customer.
Loyalty Points - Categorical variable. It denotes loyalty points achieved by the customer.
Discount- Categorical variable. It denotes whether customer is eligible for discount or not.
Gift- Categorical variable. It denotes whether customer is eligible for gift or not.
Earlybird - Categorical variable. It denotes whether the customer gets information about offers on priority basis.
Reward - Categorical variable. It denotes the type of reward achieved by the customer.

Reward is our target variable.
title: Rewards
subtitle: Reward Type Prediction Dataset
